name: Cornelius
description:
Cornelius is about a mushroom whose home is at risk of collapse. The forest he lives in relies on the power of the sacred stone to keep the evil from taking over, you must restore it to full power to prevent your home from being torn apart, LIMB FROM LIMB!

This is a concept for a game I've wanted to build for a long time, hopefully in the future I can go full time and build the game that I know this could be.

Thanks so much for playing!
